client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class representing a client. A client calls an organization in a newly created thread. A client can drop a call.
